source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a computer-generated scenery shot of a fortified border area, likely representing the Berlin Wall. The camera pans along a dirt and grass strip situated between two high concrete walls. One side features anti-tank obstacles, while the other side reveals a long, curving outer wall with city buildings in the background.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video presents a computer-generated scenery shot of a fortified border area, likely representing the Berlin Wall. The camera pans along a dirt and grass strip situated between two high concrete walls. One side features anti-tank obstacles, while the other side reveals a long, curving outer wall with city buildings in the background.

generated_critique: The caption includes the speculative phrase "likely representing the Berlin Wall," which violates the instruction to "Avoid speculative statements." The description of the camera's movement as "pans along" is also imprecise; the camera moves forward while simultaneously panning to the right. The caption should be revised to more accurately describe the camera's motion and remove the interpretive statement about the location.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video presents a computer-generated shot of a fortified border area. The camera moves forward along a dirt and grass strip situated between two high concrete walls. As it advances, the camera pans to the right, revealing a long, curving outer wall with city buildings in the background, while the other side is lined with anti-tank obstacles.
